## ICallInfo interface

Represents a substitute parameters specification interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICallInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [args](./typeioc.icallinfo.args.md) | <code>any[]</code> | Substitute invocation parameters |
|  [get](./typeioc.icallinfo.get.md) | <code>() =&gt; any</code> | Invokes original subject getter. If original subject member is not a getter nor a field, this member is undefined |
|  [invoke](./typeioc.icallinfo.invoke.md) | <code>(args?: any &#124; any[]) =&gt; any &#124; void</code> | Invokes original subject member |
|  [name](./typeioc.icallinfo.name.md) | <code>string</code> | Original subject member name |
|  [next](./typeioc.icallinfo.next.md) | <code>(result?: any) =&gt; any</code> | Invokes next substitution in a chain. If only one substitution is present in the chain, this member is undefined |
|  [result](./typeioc.icallinfo.result.md) | <code>any</code> | Represents a result of a previous substitution in a chain, if it exist |
|  [set](./typeioc.icallinfo.set.md) | <code>({}: {}) =&gt; void</code> | Invokes original subject setter. If original subject member is not a setter nor a field, this member is undefined |
|  [source](./typeioc.icallinfo.source.md) | <code>{}</code> | Original subject |
|  [type](./typeioc.icallinfo.type.md) | <code>CallInfo</code> | Original subject member type [CallInfo](./typeioc.callinfo.md) |
